Objectives: Repair two breaches in one turn. (Requires Giant and Walls)
Defeat an enemy outside the walls with a Trebuchet (Requires Trebuchet)
Repair all of the wall breaches with Giants. (Requires Giants, Walls, and Ranged Support)

parameters: Repair two breaches in one turn. (Requires Giant and Walls)
Defeat an enemy outside the walls with a Trebuchet (Requires Trebuchet)
Repair all of the wall breaches with Giants. (Requires Giants, Walls, and Ranged Support)
Our walls are breached! We have no engineers to repair them...
Our engineers are ready to repair the walls! But we're low on materials...
We can make do with Giants! Send them into the breaches to repair the walls!

Author: Magnemania
